name: Alix Perez
description: '''Alix Depauw''', better known by the stage name '''Alix Perez''', is a [[drum and bass]] [[DJ]] and [[Record producer|producer]], originally from [[Charleroi]], Belgium. Based in [[New Zealand]], his music is sometimes characterised as [[liquid funk]] amongst other labels. He founded the record label and clothing imprint 1985 Music in 2016.
